BeamSpot slice, ttbar events, FTK, pu46, run2 chains BeamSpot slice, ttbar, FTK, pu46, run2 chains EventMax=1000;runMergedChain=True;doFTK=True;rec.doFloatingPointException.set_Value_and_Lock(False) TrigInDetValidation/TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_BeamspotSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long
